stimulusHtml: Fine the particular solution y=f(x) to the differential equation d y d x = ( 1 − 2 x 2 ) ( y − 1 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@48F4@ with initial condition f(1)=2 .

features.html:
The following are related to this scenario:

Consider the differential equation d y d x = ( 1 − 2 x 2 ) ( y − 1 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@48F4@ ,where x≠0 . Let y=f(x) be the particular solution to the differential equation with initial condition f(1)=2 .
